properties.areaDesc: Coastal waters from Cape Shoalwater WA to Cascade Head OR out 10 nm; Waters from Cape Shoalwater WA to Cascade Head OR from 10 to 60 nm
properties.headline: Small Craft Advisory issued March 3 at 2:28AM PST until March 4 at 3:00AM PST by NWS Portland OR
properties.description:
* WHAT...Southwest winds 10 to 15 kt with gusts to 20 kt and seas
building to 10 to 13 feet at 16 seconds. Isolated gusts to 25 kt
possible Tue afternoon through the evening.

* WHERE...Waters from Cape Shoalwater WA to Cascade Head OR from
10 to 60 NM and Coastal waters from Cape Shoalwater WA to
Cascade Head OR out 10 NM.

* WHEN...Until 3 AM PST Wednesday.

* IMPACTS...Conditions will be hazardous to small craft.
properties.instruction:
Inexperienced mariners, especially those operating smaller
vessels, should avoid navigating in hazardous conditions.

NWSheadline: SMALL CRAFT ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 3 AM PST WEDNESDAY
